dej loaf: so we got stopped at the airport on the way back from south africa. and we home and they stop us they wanna go through our bags. he was going through my purse and he see my money and hes like how much is this. and im like i dont know how much is this sir i just grabbed it from the crib i dont know. thats why we need a jet man its crazy
